spells.name: Life Drain
spells.description: Reach out with a hand of shadowy energy to a target within 4 tiles, draining their life force. Deal 1d8 shadow damage plus negative trait value to the target and heal yourself for half the damage dealt.

spells.name: Raise Skeleton
spells.description: Infuse a nearby corpse within 4 tiles with dark energy, raising it as a skeleton under your control. The skeleton has HP and MVMT equal to your negative trait value and attacks with melee, dealing 1d6 shadow damage. It acts on your turn.

spells.name: Dark Pact
spells.description: Sacrifice up to your negative trait value in HP to grant 2x that much temporary HP to yourself or an ally.

spells.name: Soul Shackle
spells.description: Choose a creature within 4 tiles. Whenever you receive damage or healing, the target takes that amount of damage.

spells.name: Blood Extraction
spells.description: Draw latent energy from an adjacent corpse and use it to restore yourself. You heal 1d6 HP. If there is any excess healing, you gain it as temporary HP.

spells.name: Deathwalk
spells.description: You embrace unlife and become ephemeral like a ghost, moving forward up to 4 tiles. You may pass through other creatures, and deal 1d4 necrotic damage to any creature you pass through.

spells.name: Leechstrike
spells.description: Infuse your equipped weapon with necrotic energy. Your next 2 basic attacks deal additional damage equal to your negative trait value.

spells.name: Unholy Miasma
spells.description: Choose a 2x2 tile area within 6 tiles. Each target takes rolls a VIG contest against your MND. On fail they take the Poisoned status (value equal to your negative trait value).

spells.name: Life Harvest
spells.description: Draw energy from all adjacent creatures. Each takes 1d6 shadow damage and you heal for half the total damage dealt (rounded down).

spells.name: Corpse Explosion
spells.description: You force the latent energy within a collapsed foe to explode, dealing 1d6 shadow damage plus negative trait value to all adjacent creatures.

spells.name: Darkmoon Curse
spells.description: Choose a creature within 4 tiles. That creature takes 1d6 shadow damage and takes on the Cursed status (value equal to your neg trait value)

spells.name: Mark of Death
spells.description: Choose a creature within 4 tiles. For the next 3 rounds whenever that creature takes damage it takes additional shadow damage equal to your negative trait value.

spells.name: Gravebind
spells.description: A targeted creature within 6 tiles makes a Reflex(AGL) save against your MND. On fail, they take on the Rooted (2) status and take shadow damage equal to your negative trait value.

spells.name: Grasp of the Grave
spells.description: A shadowy figure of death rises from the ground beneath a creature within 6 tiles. They roll a MND contest against you. If they fail, they take 1d6 necrotic damage and take on the Weakened (neg trait value) status

spells.name: Blood Pact
spells.description: Sacrifice up to your negative trait value in HP to deal 2x that much more damage on your next spell or attack. (This ability does not consume your action)

spells.name: Raise Skeletal Colossus
spells.description: Infuse several corpses within 4 tiles with dark energy, combining their bones into a massive skeletal colossus. The colossus has HP equal to your negative trait value + the number of corpses consumed and may move up to 4 tiles on your turn and perform a melee attack on your turn, dealing 1d6 + the number of corpses consumed shadow damage.

spells.name: Blood Puppet
spells.description: Manipulate the flesh of the living like a marionette. Target a creature within 4 tiles. They must roll a VIG contest against your MND. On a failure, you may immediately move them up to 3 tiles in any direction. If you move them into a hazard (trap, fire, edge), they take 1d6 damage. You can move them into obvious self-harm (e.g. off a cliff).

spells.name: Bone Armor
spells.description: Animate shattered bone to shield your flesh. You wrap yourself in jagged bone fragments from a corpse within 2 tiles. Gain temp HP equal to 2x your negative trait value. Any creature that hits you with a melee attack takes 1d4 piercing damage.

spells.name: Veil of the Forgotten
spells.description: Your body is lost between life and death. Become insubstantial for 2 turns. While in this state, you are immune to non-magical attacks, can move through enemies and walls (up to 1 tile thick), and cannot be targeted by reactions. You cannot deal damage during this time, but may cast non-damaging spells.

spells.name: Cloak of Shadows
spells.description: If your negative trait value is 3 or greater, you wrap yourself in a shroud of shadow energy. You gain the Invisible status until you perform an attack or check/contest.

spells.name: Soul Walk
spells.description: Choose a corpse within 12 tiles. Once per turn you may teleport to the space where that corpse is located without using your action or movement.

spells.name: Orb of Shadow
spells.description: Create an orb of shadow with a radius of 20ft. No light can penetrate the orb, and all creatures within are given the Blind status. The orb lasts for 10 minutes (60 rounds, 1 turn) or until dismissed.

spells.name: Darkvision
spells.description: Grant a creature the ability to see in total darkness for 10 minutes. Also removes the Blind status.

spells.name: Nightmare
spells.description: Induce dreams of your choosing upon a sleeping target.

spells.name: Speak with the Dead
spells.description: You touch a dead creature, allowing you to communicate with them for 24 hours. If the creature does not speak a language you are familiar with you may express and understand basic ideas an emotions, as if you were communicating nonverbally.

spells.name: Detect Sacred
spells.description: You can sense the presence of sacred magic within 100 feet. Any material thicker than 2 inches prevents you from detecting anything.

spells.name: Flicker
spells.description: Instantly teleport up to 10ft to a shadowed space you can see. Can bypass bars, slats, or small gaps, but not solid objects.

spells.name: Eavesdrop
spells.description: You enchant a shadowed space to repeat all spoken conversation in your mind as a whisper. Lasts 10 minutes.

spells.name: Shadow Veil
spells.description: You and up to 3 allies become nearly invisible in shadow or dim light. Gain advantage on all Stealth checks for 10 minutes.
